refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: enum CallIds
refsect2.programlisting:
typedef enum { CALL_CHUNKER_RESET, CALL_CHUNKER_CHUNK_NONE, CALL_CHUNKER_CHUNK_KEYS, CALL_CHUNKER_CHUNK_ROWS, CALL_CHUNKER_CHUNK_COLUMNS, CALL_CHUNKER_NEXT_CHUNK, CALL_CHUNKER_PREVIOUS_CHUNK, CALL_CHUNKER_NEXT_KEY, CALL_CHUNKER_PREVIOUS_KEY, CALL_CHUNKER_KEY_UP, CALL_CHUNKER_KEY_DOWN, CALL_CHUNKER_KEY_LEFT, CALL_CHUNKER_KEY_RIGHT, CALL_CHUNKER_KEY_HIGHLIGHT, CALL_CHUNKER_KEY_UNHIGHLIGHT, CALL_CHUNKER_WRAP_TOFIRST_CHUNK, CALL_CHUNKER_WRAP_TOLAST_CHUNK, CALL_CHUNKER_WRAP_TOFIRST_KEY, CALL_CHUNKER_WRAP_TOLAST_KEY, CALL_CHUNKER_WRAP_TOBOTTOM, CALL_CHUNKER_WRAP_TOTOP, CALL_CHUNKER_WRAP_TOLEFT, CALL_CHUNKER_WRAP_TORIGHT, CALL_CHUNKER_MOVE_LEFTRIGHT, CALL_CHUNKER_MOVE_TOPBOTTOM, CALL_CHUNKER_IF_NEXT_CHUNK, CALL_CHUNKER_IF_PREVIOUS_CHUNK, CALL_CHUNKER_IF_NEXT_KEY, CALL_CHUNKER_IF_PREVIOUS_KEY, CALL_CHUNKER_IF_TOP, CALL_CHUNKER_IF_BOTTOM, CALL_CHUNKER_IF_LEFT, CALL_CHUNKER_IF_RIGHT, CALL_CHUNKER_IF_KEY_SELECTED, CALL_CHUNKER_HIGHLIGHT_CENTER, CALL_CHUNKER_HIGHLIGHT_FIRST_CHUNK, CALL_CHUNKER_HIGHLIGHT_FIRST_KEY, CALL_CHUNKER_SELECT_CHUNK, CALL_CHUNKER_HIGHLIGHT_CHUNK, CALL_CHUNKER_UNHIGHLIGHT_ALL,
CALL_SCANNER_REPEAT_ON, /* CALL_SCANNER_REPEAT_OFF, use CALL_STATE_RESTART */
CALL_TIMER1_SET, CALL_TIMER1_STOP, CALL_TIMER2_SET, CALL_TIMER2_STOP, CALL_TIMER3_SET, CALL_TIMER3_STOP, CALL_TIMER4_SET, CALL_TIMER4_STOP, CALL_TIMER5_SET, CALL_TIMER5_STOP,
CALL_COUNTER_SET, CALL_COUNTER_INCREMENT, CALL_COUNTER_DECREMENT, CALL_COUNTER_GET,
CALL_STATE_RESTART, CALL_STATE_NEXT, CALL_STATE_JUMP,
CALL_OUTPUT_SELECTEDKEY, CALL_SET_SELECTEDKEY,
CALL_FEEDBACK,
CALL_GET_RATE } CallIds;

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_initialize ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gok_scanner_initialize (const gchar *directory, const gchar *accessmethod, const gchar *selectaction, const gchar *scanaction);
refsect2.para: Reads all the access methods from the given directory and gets them ready to go.

listitem.simpara: The name of the directory to read the access method files from.
If non-NULL, overrides access method name in gconf configuration data.
If non-NULL, overrides action associated with 'select' for the current access method in gconf configuration data.
If non-NULL, overrides access method associated with 'select' for the current access method in gconf configuration data.
TRUE if the access methods were initialized, FALSE if not. Don't use the access methods if this fails.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_close ()
refsect2.para: Stops the current access method and frees any memory allocated for the access methods. This must be called at the end of the program.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_stop ()
refsect2.para: Stops the current access method.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_start ()
refsect2.para: Starts the current access method.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_change_method ()
refsect2.para: Changes the type of access method.

listitem.simpara: Name of the desired access method.
TRUE if the access method was changed, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_create_access_method ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new access method structure and adds it to the list of access methods.

listitem.simpara: Name of the access method.
A pointer to the new access method, NULL if if can't be created.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_reset_access_method ()
refsect2.para: Resets the current access method so it's ready for use.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_change_state ()
refsect2.para: Maps event handlers to effects..

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the new state.
Name of the access method that contains the state.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_set_handlers_null ()
refsect2.para: Sets all the event handlers to NULL.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_read_access_method ()
refsect2.para: Read an access method file from disk and create a new access method. The new access method is added to the list of access methods.

listitem.simpara: Name of the access method file.
TRUE if the acces method was created, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_construct_state ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new handler state.

listitem.simpara: A pointer to the new state, NULL if it was not created.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_construct_rate ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new access method rate.

listitem.simpara: A pointer to the new rate, NULL if it was not created.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_construct_handler ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new access method handler.

listitem.simpara: Name of the handler.
A pointer to the new handler, NULL if it was not created.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_read_rates ()
refsect2.para: Reads the rates for the given access method and add them to the list of rates stored on the access method.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the XML node that contains the first rate.
Pointer to the access method that is associated with the rates.
TRUE if the rates were read, FALSE if there were 1 or more errors reading the rates.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_read_description ()
refsect2.para: Reads the description of the access method and stores it on the structure.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the XML document that contains the node.
Pointer to the XML root node.
Pointer to the access method that is associated with the description.
TRUE if the description was read, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_read_operation ()
refsect2.para: Reads the UI 'operation' of the access method and stores it on the structure.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the XML document that contains the node.
Pointer to the XML root node.
Pointer to the access method that is associated with the operation.
TRUE if the operation was read, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_read_ui_loop ()
refsect2.para: Reads the UI 'operation' of the access method and stores it on the structure.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the parent control that will contain any new controls found in the node.
Pointer to the XML root node.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_read_feedback ()
refsect2.para: Reads the UI 'feedback' of the access method and stores it on the structure.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the XML doc that contains the feedbacks.
Pointer to the XML root node.
Pointer to the access method that is associated with the feedback.
TRUE if the feedback was read, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_read_options ()
refsect2.para: Reads the UI 'options' of the access method and stores it on the structure.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the XML document that contains the node.
Pointer to the XML root node.
Pointer to the access method that is associated with the options.
TRUE if the options were read, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_update_rates ()
refsect2.para: Updates all the rates in all access methods from the GokData.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_get_current_access_method ()
refsect2.para: Accessor function to get the current access method.

listitem.simpara: A pointer to the current access method.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_get_current_state ()
refsect2.para: Accessor function to get the current handler state.

listitem.simpara: A pointer to the current handler state.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_get_pointer_location ()
refsect2.para: Gets the current location of the mouse pointer.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the integer that receives the mouse pointer X coordinate.
Pointer to the integer that receives the mouse pointer Y coordinate.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_timer_set ()
refsect2.para: Starts a timer.

listitem.simpara: Time in 100s of a second.
Timer identifier
Always 0.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_timer_stop ()
refsect2.para: Stops a timer.

listitem.simpara: Id of the timer that will be stopped.
Always 0.
Pointer to the string that describes one or more effect types.
An int that describes all the effect types in the string.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_timer_set_dwell_rate ()
refsect2.para: Sets the dwell rate.

listitem.simpara: Dwell rate in 100s of a second.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_timer_start_dwell ()
refsect2.para: Starts the dwell timer.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_timer_stop_dwell ()
refsect2.para: Stops the dwell timer

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_timer_on_dwell ()
refsect2.para: This will be called when the dwell timer counts down.

listitem.simpara: Passed from the event. Ignored.
Always FALSE.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_left_button_down ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the left mouse button down event.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_left_button_up ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the left mouse button up event.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_right_button_down ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the right mouse button down event.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_right_button_up ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the right mouse button up event.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_middle_button_down ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the middle mouse button down event.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_middle_button_up ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the mouse middle button up event.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_mouse_movement ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the mouse movement event. Stores the location of the mouse pointer.

listitem.simpara: Horizontal location of the mouse pointer.
Vertical location of the mouse pointer.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_on_timer1 ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the timer1 event (timer 1 has counted down).

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the user data associated with the timer.
FALSE always.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_on_timer2 ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the timer2 event (timer 2 has counted down).

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the user data associated with the timer.
FALSE always.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_on_timer3 ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the timer3 event (timer 3 has counted down).

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the user data associated with the timer.
FALSE always.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_on_timer4 ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the timer4 event (timer 4 has counted down).

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the user data associated with the timer.
FALSE always.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_on_timer5 ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the timer5 event (timer 5 has counted down).

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the user data associated with the timer.
FALSE always.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_on_key_enter ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the key enter notify.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the key that the mouse pointer has entered.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_on_key_leave ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the key leave notify.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the key that the mouse pointer has left.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_on_switch1_down ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the switch 1 down event.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_on_switch1_up ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the switch 1 up event.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_on_switch2_down ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the switch 2 down event.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_on_switch2_up ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the switch 2 up event.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_on_switch3_down ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the switch 3 down event.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_on_switch3_up ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the switch 3 up event.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_on_switch4_down ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the switch 4 down event.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_on_switch4_up ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the switch 4 up event.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_on_switch5_down ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the switch 5 down event.

refsect2.title: gok_scanner_on_switch5_up ()
refsect2.para: Handler for the switch 5 up event.
